data.nrql: SELECT PERCENTAGE(COUNT(*), WHERE (integration_latency IS NULL OR integration_latency < 100) AND (latency IS NULL OR latency < 100)) AS 'Health Score' FROM amazon_apigateway_stage FACET amazon_apigateway_stage_name
SELECT uniqueCount(amazon_apigateway_stage_name) AS 'Stages' FROM amazon_apigateway_stage FACET cache_cluster_status

presentation.title: Cache Cluster Status Distribution
presentation.notes: The status of the cache cluster for the stage, if enabled.

data.nrql: SELECT uniqueCount(amazon_apigateway_stage_name) AS 'Stages' FROM amazon_apigateway_stage FACET region

presentation.title: Region Distribution
presentation.notes: The AWS Region this object belongs to.

data.nrql: SELECT average(integration_latency) FROM amazon_apigateway_stage COMPARE WITH 1 WEEK AGO TIMESERIES AUTO

presentation.title: Integration Latency (Milliseconds)
presentation.notes: The time between when API Gateway relays a request to the back end and when it receives a response from the back end.

data.nrql: SELECT average(latency) FROM amazon_apigateway_stage COMPARE WITH 1 WEEK AGO TIMESERIES AUTO

presentation.title: Latency (Milliseconds)
presentation.notes: The time between when API Gateway receives a request from a client and when it returns a response to the client. The latency includes the integration latency and other API Gateway overhead.

data.nrql: SELECT sum(`4xx_errors`) FROM amazon_apigateway_stage COMPARE WITH 1 WEEK AGO TIMESERIES AUTO

presentation.title: 4xx Errors (Errors)
presentation.notes: The number of client-side errors captured

data.nrql: SELECT sum(`5xx_errors`) FROM amazon_apigateway_stage COMPARE WITH 1 WEEK AGO TIMESERIES AUTO

presentation.title: 5xx Errors (Errors)
presentation.notes: The number of server-side errors captured.

data.nrql: SELECT sum(calls_count) FROM amazon_apigateway_stage COMPARE WITH 1 WEEK AGO TIMESERIES AUTO

presentation.title: Calls Count (Calls)
presentation.notes: The number of calls to API methods.

data.nrql: SELECT sum(cache_miss_count) FROM amazon_apigateway_stage COMPARE WITH 1 WEEK AGO TIMESERIES AUTO

presentation.title: Cache Miss Count (Requests)
presentation.notes: The number of requests served from the back end when API caching is enabled.
